SELECT A.WORKDAY workday, SUM(A.SEND_CNT) sendCnt, SUM(A.SUCCESS_CNT) successCnt, SUM(A.FAIL_CNT) failCnt, SUM(A.OPEN_CNT) openCnt, SUM(A.CLICK_CNT) clickCnt FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(RESERVE_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') WORKDAY, SEND_CNT, SUCCESS_CNT, FAIL_CNT, OPEN_CNT, CLICK_CNT FROM GS_SEND_SCHDL WHERE SEND_FLAG = '40' AND RESERVE_DATE >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{dashboard.startDate}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AND RESERVE_DATE <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{dashboard.endDate}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
AND SEND_TYPE LIKE 'C%'
AND SEND_TYPE LIKE 'R%'
) A GROUP BY A.WORKDAY
